name: Individual CPU usage too high
description: Checks whether the individual CPU usage exceeds the configured threshold over a one minute interval

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check if there are any suspicious activities or patterns in your virtual machine's resource utilization. This could include running unnecessary processes, high memory consumption, or I/O wait times.
2. If you find any such issues, consider optimizing your virtual machine's configuration by adjusting settings like CPU shares, memory allocation, or network settings. You
